item.description: Hi Everyone! 2013 is going to be an amazing year! Time to set intentions! Potluck Fri 1/11. Please bring an organic raw dish enough for 6-8 people. If you are new and not sure what to bring ....a salad (fruit or veggie) is always good. If you are in a pinch for $15 I will make a dish for you. Can't wait to see you!!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Jan 11, 2013!!!! Potluck! 7pm
